data.name: Undefeated Samurai
data.detailed_description:
Undefeated Samurai is an exciting new online role-playing metaverse (RPG) that combines an incredible, immersive virtual-reality experience.

We have created a metaverse where players can socialize with each other while trying to be the one that survives.


Undefeated Samurai is a built-for-VR feudal Japan fantasy sandbox with melee combat that is driven by stats and sword fighting that fully utilizes a unique and realistic physics-driven interaction and combat system.



In Undefeated Samurai, the combat is limited only by your own creativity. Choose your character, choose your sword, fight your way; Be the undefeated Samurai you always dreamed of becoming!

In Undefeated Samurai, the combat is limited only by your own creativity. Choose your character, choose your sword, fight your way; Be the undefeated Samurai you always dreamed of becoming!
data.short_description: Undefeated Samurai is a built-for-VR feudal Japan fantasy sandbox with melee combat that is driven by stats and sword fighting skills. Win battles to become the Undefeated Samurai.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / 1060
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages like frequent violence and gore.
